name: Not So Good TD
description:
Not So Good :: TD

You sleep, yo- OH WAIT! There are dangerous somethings nearby!!!

You must immediately build some towers and destroy deadly monsters before they erease your life!  (Or something. I don't know, didn't play the game.)

Not So Good TD is a Tower Defense, in which you just build towers, set game speed to x4 and spam upgrade button on random buildings. Features:
  • 10 Towers
  • 10 Levels  (+1 which you propably won't find anyway)
  • Enemies getting stronger every wave
  • Graphics better then in my last game
  • Ability to disable post processing (useful if you have Intel hd 4000)
